QuestData.Title: Profiting off of the Past
QuestData.Description: Let me guess, you're here to deal with the mogu statues that are being reanimated. What a coincidence, I'm here to, um... conduct research on the mogu.$B$BI tell you what, if you bring me as many of the mogu relics in there that you can carry, I'll give you a cut. Of the research... funding.
QuestData.CompletionText: Where am I going to be able to put all of the relics?
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! I mean, wow! Thank you, $n!$B$B<Bao Jian's eyes widen with anticipation of the proceeds from the relics.>$B$BNow that you've softened them up, I'm thinking that I might head in. Just a few more relics from around the outskirts. Nothing dangerous.
